preference.name: Fnd0ItemLineLite_bl_line_name_expression
preference.preference_description: Defines the property expression used for evaluation of the line name for objects of the Fnd0ItemLineLite business object type. Valid Values: The valid value is a string that contains property internal names (always preceded with the $ character), the character + to signal concatenation, and strings surrounded by double quotation marks.
